default.shortDescription: Embed your application in Office documents
descriptionParagraphs: Content add-ins are surfaces that you can embed directly into Office documents. You can use content add-ins to embed rich, web-based objects such as charts, data visualizations, or media into a worksheet or to give users access to interface controls that run code to modify the Office document or display data from a data source. Use content add-ins when you want to embed functionality directly into the document.

mediaAssets.alt: Interactive map displayed in an email message
Interactive map displayed overlaying a message

detailItemCategories.name: Types of extensions
detailItemCategories.description: Here are different ways how you can expose your app inside an Office document
